name: Voxperimental
description: This is my attempt and creating and publishing a Minecraft learning project within a week. I have an explainer video/Devlog coming to my channel flaroon (youtube.com/Flaroon) so subscribe to stay notified. The controls should be pretty self-explanatory. It is still in development and there are many bugs to be fixed when i finish creating the video especially performance. If you have a CPU with many threads/cores you should be able to run it at a solid 60+ frames. So have fun and have a good day.
